Package org.red5.io.utils

Class LEB128

java.lang.Object
org.red5.io.utils.LEB128
public final class LEB128 extends Object
This class encodes and decodes integers in the LEB128 compression format. Reference examples:
Author:
The Red5 Project, Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
